name: chrome-extension-monitor
description: Monitor your Chrome Extension Comments and Reviews

scripts.build: pnpm run clean && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack/webpack.prod.js
scripts.release: pnpm run documentation && pnpm run update-versions && pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && node scripts/compress
scripts.documentation: pnpm run documentation:release-notes && pnpm run documentation:documentation
scripts.documentation:release-notes: markdown documentation/ReleaseNotes.md > documentation/ReleaseNotes.html && echo -n "export const ReleaseNotes = \`" > src/options/ReleaseNotes.ts && cat documentation/ReleaseNotes.html >> src/options/ReleaseNotes.ts && echo "\`;" >> src/options/ReleaseNotes.ts
scripts.documentation:documentation: markdown documentation/Documentation.md > documentation/Documentation.html && echo -n "export const Documentation = \`" > src/options/Documentation.ts && cat documentation/Documentation.html >> src/options/Documentation.ts && echo "\`;" >> src/options/Documentation.ts
scripts.update-versions: export VERSION=$(jq -r .version package.json) && jq ".version=\"$VERSION\"" src/manifest.json | jq ".version_name=\"Release $VERSION\"" > manifest.new && mv manifest.new src/manifest.json && git add src/manifest.json documentation/* src/ReleaseNotes.ts && git commit -m"Release $VERSION"; exit 0
scripts.preinstall: node -e "if (process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('pnpm') === -1) { console.log('[31mPlease use pnpm for installing[0m'); process.exit(1); }"
